name: auralis-transcriptor
description: Star Trek LCARS-themed audio/video transcription application

scripts.build: cd frontend/auralis-transcriptor-frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend/auralis-transcriptor-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/auralis-transcriptor-frontend && npm install
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend/auralis-transcriptor-frontend && npm ci && npm run build

author: MiniMax Agent
